PersonalizedTripPlanner.regularTitle: Plan Your Dream Trip in Yogyakarta
PersonalizedTripPlanner.regularDesc: Forget rigid tour packages. We design every travel detail tailored to you — your style, your budget, your experience.
PersonalizedTripPlanner.exclusiveDesc: From VIP access to premium culinary experiences, we craft every detail to deliver an unforgettable luxury trip in Yogyakarta.
PersonalizedTripPlanner.extraServicesDesc: We also offer City Tours for maximum flexibility during your stay in Jogja.

WhyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Us?
WhyChooseUs.guideDesc: Our guides are local residents who will give you an authentic and memorable experience.
WhyChooseUs.flexibleDesc: Customize your trip according to your interests and budget with our adaptable plans.
WhyChooseUs.priceDesc: We offer competitive prices without compromising on quality.
WhyChooseUs.supportDesc: Our team is always ready to assist you, ensuring a smooth and worry-free journey.

ServiceHighlights.title: Our Service Highlights
ServiceHighlights.subtitle: We offer a range of services to make your trip unforgettable.
ServiceHighlights.packageDesc: Perfect for those who want a stress-free vacation with everything arranged from start to finish.
ServiceHighlights.tourFeatures: Guided Tours, Cultural Experiences, Day Trips
ServiceHighlights.tourDesc: Already have your stay covered? Join our expertly guided local tours and immerse yourself in the culture.
ServiceHighlights.cityDesc: Enjoy the flexibility to explore Yogyakarta at your own pace with our reliable and well-maintained vehicles.

PopularPackages.title: Explore Our Popular Packages
PopularPackages.subtitle: Curated itineraries for the best experiences in Yogyakarta.

packages.title: 2 Days: Borobudur & Prambanan
packages.description: Witness the majestic sunrise at Borobudur and explore the grand Prambanan Temple complex.

packages.title: 3 Days: Yogyakarta Adventure
packages.description: Feel the thrill of Jomblang Cave, Timang Beach, and Mount Merapi’s slopes.

packages.title: 4 Days: Cultural Immersion
packages.description: Immerse yourself in Javanese culture with visits to the Palace, Taman Sari, and a batik workshop.

HowItWorks.title: How It Works
HowItWorks.subtitle: A simple process to plan your dream trip.

steps.title: Choose a Package
steps.description: Select the travel package or service that best suits your preferences.

steps.title: Fill in Your Details
steps.description: Provide your name and contact number for the next step.

steps.title: Pay the Deposit
steps.description: Make a down payment to secure your booking.

steps.title: Service Preparation
steps.description: Our team will carefully prepare all your travel arrangements.

steps.title: Final Confirmation
steps.description: We’ll contact you for final confirmation and important trip details.

steps.title: Enjoy Your Trip
steps.description: Enjoy your journey! We’ll make sure everything goes smoothly.

otherServices.title: Explore Our Other Services
otherServices.subtitle: Everything you need for a complete and flexible travel experience.

packages.title: Tour Packages
packages.description: Choose from our curated travel packages for a hassle-free holiday. We've combined the best destinations and activities.

carRental.title: Car Rental
carRental.description: Explore Yogyakarta freely with our well-maintained fleet, available with or without a driver.

activities.title: Daily Activities
activities.description: Already have plans? Book daily activities or tours separately, from cooking classes to volcano jeep adventures.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: We are dedicated to creating the best travel experiences, blending comfort, adventure, and local authenticity.

about.label: About Travelmore
about.description: At Travelmore, we combine professional service with a passion for exploration. Whether you’re traveling locally or abroad, our experienced team is ready to plan your journey with care and creativity.

skills.label: Our Expertise
skills.title: Why Choose Travelmore
skills.description: Our team brings together technology, creativity, and experience to deliver an unforgettable travel experience.

about_cta.title: We’re Ready to Take You to Your Dream Destination
about_cta.subtitle: Let us handle the details — all you need to do is enjoy every moment.

PackagesPage.title: Explore Our Tour Packages
PackagesPage.subtitle: Find the perfect adventure in Yogyakarta, curated just for you. Adjust the filters to match your preferences.

regular.title: Trip Planner Consultation
regular.description: Let our team help arrange a travel plan according to your budget, interests, and vacation style. The right solution for an efficient and memorable trip.

terms.t3: Excludes costs for tickets, hotels, or activities

exclusive.title: Exclusive Trip Planner Consultation
exclusive.description: Enjoy a premium travel experience with a custom-made itinerary by our senior travel designer. Get exclusive access and priority service throughout your journey.

terms.t3: Excludes costs for tickets, hotels, or activities (paid separately)

s1.title: Fill the Form
s1.description: Tell us about your travel needs through our brief form.

s2.title: Initial Discussion
s2.description: Our planner team will contact you for further discussion.

s3.title: Itinerary Crafting
s3.description: We will draft an itinerary based on our discussion.

s4.title: Revision & Finalization
s4.description: You can provide feedback to refine the itinerary.

s5.title: Enjoy Your Holiday!
s5.description: With the final itinerary in hand, enjoy your trip!

sidebar.title: Tell us your travel preferences
sidebar.description: Our multi-step form makes it easy to provide all the necessary details for us to craft your perfect trip.

summary.reviewDescription: Please review your selections below before submitting.

PlannerForm.title: Trip Planner

PlannerForm.step8_budgetPriorityDesc: Please set your priorities using the drag & drop feature.
PlannerForm.step9_accommodationPreference_placeholde: e.g., Glamping in nature, Villa on the beach
PlannerForm.step10_consent: I agree to receive itinerary recommendations and prices via WhatsApp.

Backpacker.title: Backpacker Pack
Backpacker.description: Perfect for those who love exploring simply, efficiently, and on a budget. All basic travel needs are met without breaking the bank. The focus is on experience, not luxury.

Traveler.title: Traveler Pack
Traveler.description: The most balanced choice for those who want comfort without hassle, while staying within budget. Activities, accommodation, and experiences are designed for travelers who want to fully enjoy.

Exclusive.title: Exclusive Pack
Exclusive.description: For those who want a holiday with the best quality and uncompromising service. Every detail is premium, from transport and accommodation to exclusive experiences that not everyone can have.

ServicesPage.header_subtitle: From private travel consultations to ready-made packages, we provide everything you need for an unforgettable adventure in Yogyakarta.
